Articles.Content:
Hi all:

I like so much ORION project, so i decided to make a 3d render showing the module. It uses the awesome ORION module included in the American Pack by BobCat. I've tried for the first time the "compositing" tool in Blender. Comments are welcome. (I know the "stars" look like everything but stars... I'm a beginner with that "compositing" thing, sorry)

Thaks again BobCat, for your amazing Orion and for letting me use it in my renders.

Cheers!

Lets just hope NASA doesn't cancel the orion project

Anyway, i like it

Last I heard, NASA were coupling it with ESA's ATV program and it produced a somewhat cool-looking offspring.

Very nice render, very nice indeed.
Nice job, but didn't Orion have a set of 4 small solar panels like KSP's 1x6's?
